1391950.name: Leaving Demo
1391950.description:
Waking up on the train, you realize that this is a different world, and the sun has practically set here. You urgently need to get out of this world.

Prepare to feel fear with your entire body. Before you is the other world where you are the same soul as everyone else and photorealistic graphics will allow you to plunge headlong into the world of nightmares. Can you get out?

Attention! Contains frightening scenes as well as violence. The game is not intended for children.
1391950.supported_languages:
英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 保加利亚语, 匈牙利语, 越南语, 希腊语, 丹麦语, 繁体中文, 简体中文, 韩语, 荷兰语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 罗马尼亚语, 俄语*, 泰语, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语, 芬兰语, 捷克语, 瑞典语, 日语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
